name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
role_name: Software Engineer especializado/a en Inteligencia Artificial
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Inteligencia Artificial** and **Generative AI** applications. Proficient in leveraging **Azure** services, including **App Services**, **Functions**, **Cosmos DB**, and **Key Vault** to build innovative solutions. Demonstrated expertise in developing AI-driven platforms that integrate **speech-to-text** capabilities and support **Intelligent Document Processing (IDP)**. Skilled in implementing **Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)** techniques and utilizing **Large Language Models (LLMs)** for advanced data processing. 

Strong background in building high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Hands-on experience with frontend and backend development frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept in deploying cloud-native solutions and managing microservices architectures, with proven ability to align with compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Well-versed in MLOps strategies, focusing on model training and orchestration with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Excellent communication skills in English and a strong advocate for collaborative, autonomous work environments.
